name: Learn Numbers for Kids
description: Educational game specially designed for preschoolers to start learning the numbers. Its fun, ad-free, and perfect for children between the ages of 2 and 5. Its fun, ad-free, and perfect for children between the ages of 2 and 5.  Join your little one as they learn the numbers, or let them discover an amazing park with fun characters who will guide them in learning 1 to 20 on their own. This simple yet entertaining game is perfect for introducing your child to the magical world of numbers.  By simply touching the screen, your little one can interact with amazing games that will allow them to learn the numbers in a simple and fun way.  Ad-free, this game is perfect for children to explore on their own and have fun without requiring the help of an adult.   BENEFITS - Tracing activities with surprising special effects. - Super fun games and activities for learning 1 to 20. - Available in 15 languages, including English USA and English UK. - Includes the first part of the adventure with 6 games for free. A one-time purchase within the app unlocks the rest of the content. - Lovely graphics and a warm voice are part of the experience.  Download it now for free and enjoy watching your child learn the numbers and have fun at the same time!  If you have an idea to make 123 Awesome Park even more fun and educational, please dont hesitate to contact us!  Website: www.papumba.com Email: info@papumba.com Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/papumbagames
